input_args.passage: 'Young-Earth Creationist View Summarized And Defended | Young-earth creationists believe that the creation days of Genesis 1 were six literal (24-hour) days, which occurred 6,000–12,000 years ago.1 ...'
input_args.claim: 'The second citation provides more specifics, stating that young-earth creationists believe that the days of creation as described in Genesis 1 were six literal 24-hour days, and that these events occurred between 6,000 and 12,000 years ago.'
